text: haey yeung ban mean bantoul towkean ambaur aisreael banteabpi( hvie r aon ban vineasa ruoch) noh tha chaur puok anak rsanow leu tukdei( sha m) nih choh. haey nowpel del kechchasanyea nei thngai barlok ban mokadl yeung nung noam puok anak mk chea krom daoy leaylam knea( chenh mk pi phnaur towkean kanleng katkdei)
